languages.text: "Я знаю, о чем речь. Странные конструкции из неизвестного материала. Во избежание несчастных случаев я приказала объявить эти территории запретными для всех. Некоторые вещи должны оставаться под толстым слоем земли и вне доступа даже столь просветленных умов, как Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю, о чем речь. Странные конструкции из неизвестного материала. Во избежание несчастных случаев я приказала объявить эти территории запретными для всех. Некоторые вещи должны оставаться под толстым слоем земли и вне доступа даже столь просветленных умов, как Механикус".

languages.text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, о чем речь. Странные конструкции из неизвестного материала. Во избежание несчастных случаев я приказала объявить эти территории запретными для всех. Некоторые вещи должны оставаться под толстым слоем земли и вне доступа даже столь просветленных умов, как Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Mechanicus."

"I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Mechanicus."

"I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Mechanicus."

"I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: “我知道您指的是什么，是那些用未知材料建造的古怪建筑。为了防止发生不幸的事故，我下令禁止任何人进入那片区域。有些东西最好还是埋藏在在厚厚的土层之下，因为哪怕是机械修会那些聪慧的头脑，也无法理解这些知识。”
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “我知道您指的是什么，是那些用未知材料建造的古怪建筑。为了防止发生不幸的事故，我下令禁止任何人进入那片区域。有些东西最好还是埋藏在在厚厚的土层之下，因为哪怕是机械修会那些聪慧的头脑，也无法理解这些知识。”

languages.text: «Sé a lo que se refiere. Estructuras extrañas de un material desconocido. Para evitar accidentes lamentables he ordenado que se prohíba todo acceso a la zona. Hay cosas que deberían quedar olvidadas bajo una gruesa capa de tierra, lejos incluso de las ilustres mentes del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Sé a lo que se refiere. Estructuras extrañas de un material desconocido. Para evitar accidentes lamentables he ordenado que se prohíba todo acceso a la zona. Hay cosas que deberían quedar olvidadas bajo una gruesa capa de tierra, lejos incluso de las ilustres mentes del Adeptus Mechanicus».

languages.text: 「何のことを仰っているのか、理解しました…未知の物質でできた奇妙な構造物ですね。不幸な事故を防ぐために、当該地域には立入厳禁の命令を出しました。厳重に埋める方が良いものもあります、帝国技術局について正しい知識を持った人間ですら理解が及びませんので」
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「何のことを仰っているのか、理解しました…未知の物質でできた奇妙な構造物ですね。不幸な事故を防ぐために、当該地域には立入厳禁の命令を出しました。厳重に埋める方が良いものもあります、帝国技術局について正しい知識を持った人間ですら理解が及びませんので」

languages.text: "Ich weiß, worauf Ihr anspielt – seltsame Strukturen aus einem unbekannten Material. Zur Vermeidung unglücklicher Unfälle habe ich den Bereich für alle zum Sperrgebiet erklärt. Manches bleibt besser unter einer dicken Schicht Erde, außerhalb der Reichweite selbst der erleuchteten Geister des Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, worauf Ihr anspielt – seltsame Strukturen aus einem unbekannten Material. Zur Vermeidung unglücklicher Unfälle habe ich den Bereich für alle zum Sperrgebiet erklärt. Manches bleibt besser unter einer dicken Schicht Erde, außerhalb der Reichweite selbst der erleuchteten Geister des Mechanicus."

languages.text: « Vous devez parler de ces étranges structures faites d'un matériau inconnu. Pour prévenir de regrettables accidents, j'ai décrété que cette zone était interdite d'accès à tous. Il y a des choses qu'il vaut mieux laisser sous une épaisse couche de poussière et hors de portée, même des esprits éclairés de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez parler de ces étranges structures faites d'un matériau inconnu. Pour prévenir de regrettables accidents, j'ai décrété que cette zone était interdite d'accès à tous. Il y a des choses qu'il vaut mieux laisser sous une épaisse couche de poussière et hors de portée, même des esprits éclairés du Mechanicus. »

languages.text: "Neden bahsettiğinizi anladım: Bilinmeyen materyallerden yapılma şu garip yapılar. Talihsiz kazaların önlenmesi için alanın herkes için yasaklı bölge ilan edilmesini emrettim. Bazı şeylerin kalın bir toprak tabakasının altında, Adeptus Mechanicus'un aydınlanmış zihinlerinin bile erişiminin ötesinde kalması daha hayırlıdır."
languages.original_text: "I know to what you're referring — strange structures of an unknown material. For the prevention of any unfortunate accidents, I ordered the area to be declared out of bounds for all. Some things are better off left under a thick layer of dirt, beyond the grasp of even the enlightened minds of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Neyden bahsettiğinizi anladım: Bilinmeyen materyallerden yapılma şu garip yapılar... Talihsiz kazaların önlenmesi için alanın herkes için yasaklı bölge ilan edilmesini emrettim. Bazı şeyler; Adeptus Mechanicus'un aydınlanmış zihinlerinin bile idrakinin ötesinde, gün yüzüne çıkmadan kalsa daha iyi olur."
